name: SpeedOnScrink
description: In the game you need to get to the golden apple without dying. If you die then you have will have to do all level from the start. You Shrink over time and  when you shrink you gain more speed thus, the less the size the more speed you get(but you can skrink only 4 time). if you shrink more than 4 time you die!!!!. there are finishlines and apple  that make you your original size and speed. More Info In-Game.
